name: CorConsultRx
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A brief review of clinical trials, new medications, and evidence-based medicine. The content is meant for pharmacists, physicians, physician assistants, nurse practitioners, nurses, and healthcare professional students.

This briefing does not provide medical advice. This briefing is for informational and educational purposes only. This briefing is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
